devices.description: Define each device. Enter in the first field the name of the webhook (replace newKey with the name of the device) and in the right panel the parameters.

deviceType.description: Select how to represent the webhooks on the controller. Don't use Switch for Alexa.

autoOffDelayMs.description: Delay in milliseconds to automatically turn off the device after being turned on. Set to 0 to immediately turn device off. Set to negative number to disable auto off.

debug.description: Enable the debug for the plugin.

unregisterOnShutdown.description: Unregister all devices on shutdown. This will remove all devices from the controller when the plugin is stopped.
